:::

```{.r .cell-code}
grades <- read.csv("https://mac-stat.github.io/data/grades.csv") |> 
  distinct(sid, sessionID, .keep_all = TRUE)

grade_distribution <- grades |> 
  count(grade)

head(grade_distribution)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
  grade    n
1     A 1506
2    A- 1381
3    AU   27
4     B  804
5    B+ 1003
6    B-  330
```


:::

```{.r .cell-code}
grade_distribution |>
  mutate(grade = fct_relevel(grade, c("A", "A-", "B+", "B", "B-", "C+", "C", "C-", "D+", "D", "D-", "NC", "S", "AU"))) |>
  ggplot(aes(x = grade, y = n)) +
    geom_col()
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](12-factors_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-1-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
grade_distribution |>
  mutate(grade = fct_reorder(grade, n)) |>
  ggplot(aes(x = grade, y = n)) +
    geom_col()
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](12-factors_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-2-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
grade_distribution |>
  mutate(grade = fct_reorder(grade, n, .desc = TRUE)) |>
  ggplot(aes(x = grade, y = n)) +
    geom_col()
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](12-factors_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-3-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
grade_distribution |>
  mutate(grade = fct_relevel(grade, c("A", "A-", "B+", "B", "B-", "C+", "C", "C-", "D+", "D", "D-", "NC", "S", "AU"))) |>
  mutate(grade = fct_recode(grade, "Satisfactory" = "S", "Audit" = "AU")) |>  # Multiple pieces go into the last 2 blanks
  ggplot(aes(x = grade, y = n)) +
    geom_col()
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](12-factors_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-4-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::
